ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectCredit for Provincial Relief (HST) Regulations
PrecisCREDIT FOR PROVINCIAL RELIEF (HST) REGULATIONS, in order to introduce the new rules, announced by the Government of Canada on August 30, 2010, that are required to accommodate the delivery of the Ontario credit.
